ygData.subject: Why do I run so slow! was Re: newbie bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Shulzari, Poswardd E ci, for the Soerbaird here: It depends on your encumberance mostly if others outrun you. I ve noticed that if I carry any more items than
ygData.messageBody:
Shulzari, Poswardd E'ci, for the Soerbaird here:

It depends on your encumberance mostly if others outrun you. I've noticed that
if I carry any more items than my banded and essentials, that almost any druid,
mage or younger bard will pass me up!

For Information: Spirit of Wolf is not stackable with our Selo's Accelerando
anymore. It was quite nice when it was however! Shaman get the spell the
earliest at level 9, while Druids I think get it at level 14.
